eventsFunctions.name: XYCollision
eventsFunctions.sentence: Create XYSort Collision at _PARAM1_, from _PARAM2_ on group _PARAM3_; Debug: _PARAM4_

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Variables:
[ _z ] Z axis value (ex: 100, -20) |
[ _x ] real X position |
[ _y ] real Y position | 
modify _x, _y value to move projected sprite

eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Project

parameters.description: Set axis of plane (X or Y)
parameters.name: Axis

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Set zOrder based on XY center position and camera angle
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: XYSort

events.inlineCode:
let _o      = objects[0]                    // GD object
let __o     = _o.getRendererObject()        // Pixi Object
let layer   = runtimeScene.getLayer()


var r = 2000
let rotation = layer.getCameraRotation() + 90
let rot = gdjs.toRad(rotation)



var dx  = r * Math.cos(rot);
var dy  = r * Math.sin(rot);
let obj = objects[0]

let x2  = layer.getCameraX() + dx
let y2  = layer.getCameraY() + dy
let rmZ = parseFloat(_o.getVariables().get("z").getValue()) || 0 //remove z

let distance = _o.getDistanceToPosition(x2,y2) + rmZ 

let x   = _o.getXFromAngleAndDistance(rotation, _o.getHeight()/2) - x2
let y   = _o.getYFromAngleAndDistance(rotation, _o.getHeight()/2) - y2
let dis = Math.sqrt(x * x + y * y)
_o.setZOrder((dis * -1) + rmZ )
